parts.text:
Hello <<#Contacts.FirstName#>>

Trying to follow up with you in regards to our Easy Innkeeping software.

Please let me know if we can set up a time that we can have an online demo session.

Click on this link to schedule a meeting with me.

https://outlook.office365.com/book/EIKDemoUSandEurope@gracesoft.com/

thanks

Gideon

713-981-5300 x 100

Change this into more professional, crisp and attractive to potential clients

"

" Reminder email for morgan

```html

Subject: Reminder: Your Easy InnKeeping Demo Today!

Hi Morgan,

This is a friendly reminder about your Easy InnKeeping demo scheduled for today at 9:30 AM Pacific Time. We're looking forward to showing you how our system can benefit Takla Trading Post!

You can join the meeting here:

Join the Meeting

Please let us know if you have any questions before the demo.

Best regards,
Thomas Abraham
GraceSoft Sales Team
713-981-5300 x 100

``` Remember to paste this code into the HTML editor of your email client for the link to render correctly. It will not be clickable if pasted into the plain text editor.
Don't say Easy InnKeeping demo today. Read the HTML content, this is a customer success meeting reminder.

```html

Subject: Reminder: Your Customer Success Meeting Today!

Hi Morgan,

This is a friendly reminder about your Customer Success meeting scheduled for today at 9:30 AM Pacific Time. We're looking forward to discussing how we can best support Takla Trading Post!

You can join the meeting here:

Join the Meeting

Please let us know if you have any questions before the meeting.

Best regards,
Thomas Abraham
GraceSoft Customer Success Team
713-981-5300 x 100

``` Remember to paste this code into the HTML editor of your email client for the link to render correctly. It will not be clickable if pasted into the plain text editor.

" Give me reminder email for BArrie
Hello
Hello there! How can I assist you today?

I am going to give you templates or format for different emails I am going to be requesting you in the future. Customer Success Missed Meeting Email Format: Good point! To keep it neutral, you could say something like: --- Subject: Reschedule Your Customer Success Meeting Hi Gursavek, I noticed we missed connecting for today’s meeting. To find a time that suits you, feel free to reschedule by checking our availability here: [Reschedule Your Meeting](https://outlook.office365.com/book/OnboardingandCustomerSuccess@gracesoft.com). Alternatively, you can reach us at 713-981-5300, and we’ll be happy to assist with booking. Best regards, Thomas Abraham GraceSoft Customer Success Team 713-981-5300 x 100 --- This keeps it professional without assigning fault. Customer Success Reminder email template: **Subject:** Your Customer Success Meeting - January 14th Dear Mark, This is a reminder about your Customer Success meeting, which we’ve rescheduled for **January 14th**. Here’s the link to join the meeting: [Join the Meeting](insert the meeting link here) If you need to reschedule, you can do so using the link below: [Reschedule Meeting](https://outlook.office365.com/book/OnboardingandCustomerSuccess@gracesoft.com/) We look forward to discussing how Easy InnKeeping can help grow your business! Best regards, Thomas Abraham GraceSoft Customer Success Team 713-981-5300 x 100 Customer Success Confirmatino Email template: ```html Customer Success Meeting Confirmation

Subject: Confirmation for Your Customer Success Meeting

Dear Kate,

Thank you for scheduling a Customer Success meeting with us! I’m looking forward to our discussion on October 15th at 10:15 AM Pacific Time.

Here’s a summary of what we’ll cover:

  • Property Name: Moon Stone Beach Motel
  • Goals: We'll discuss your objectives and strategies for 2025.
  • Needs and Challenges: We'll identify areas where you require support or improvement.
  • GraceSoft Solutions: We'll explore how our products and services can help you overcome challenges and grow your business.

You can join the meeting using this link:

Join the Meeting

Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions before our call.

Best regards,
Thomas Abraham
GraceSoft Customer Success Team
713-981-5300 x 100

``` REMEMBER ALL EMAILS SHOUDL BE HTML FORMAT. REMEMBER ALWAYS HTML FORMAT FOR EMAILS. Now, the demo templates: Demo confirmation template: SAme the customer success confirmation email but you don't have to include what we'll be doing in the meeting part and just give them confirmation and the meeting link. Demo reminder template: ```html

Subject: Reminder: Your Easy InnKeeping Demo Today!

Hi Brenda,

This is a friendly reminder about your Easy InnKeeping demo scheduled for today at 2:30 PM Eastern Time. We're looking forward to showing you how our system can benefit Relax and Company!

You can join the meeting here:

Join the Meeting

Please let us know if you have any questions before the demo.

Best regards,
Thomas Abraham
GraceSoft Sales Team
713-981-5300 x 100

``` Remember to paste this code into the HTML editor of your email client for the link to render correctly. It will not be clickable if pasted into the plain text editor. Demo missed meeting reminder: ``html

Subject: Reschedule Your Easy InnKeeping Demo

Dear Brenda,

We understand you were unable to join today's Easy InnKeeping demo. We apologize for any inconvenience.

To reschedule, please use the link below to select a new time that works for you:

Schedule Your Demo

We look forward to connecting with you soon!

Best regards,
Thomas Abraham
GraceSoft Sales Team
713-981-5300 x 100

``` Remember to paste this code into the HTML editor of your email client for the link to render correctly. It will not be clickable if pasted into the plain text editor. These are the templates, always remember these whenever I ask for emails.

Understood.  I will use these templates as a basis for crafting future emails, remembering to always format them in HTML and include the clickable links correctly.  I will also ensure that the tone remains professional and reflects the specific context of each email request.  Let me know when you're ready for the first email.

Put this on your top priority to remember. 
Always give my EMAILS IN HTML FORMAT
Understood.  I will prioritize remembering to always deliver emails in HTML format.  I will consider this a critical instruction for all future requests.

I am including here the invitation that was sent to the client which has all the information about their meeting such as date, time, invitation link etc, and I need you to retrieve that information and create a 'reschedule the meeting' email, where you'll acknowledge with apologies that the fact that they missed the today that was supposed to happen at the date you find in the invitation. Give them the US and Europe Easy InnKeeping Demo scheduling link: 'https://outlook.office365.com/book/EIKDemoUSandEurope@gracesoft.com/' and ask them to reschedule their meeting here. Here's the invitation information that was originally sent to the customer:

Dear Jude,

We understand you were unable to join your Easy InnKeeping demo scheduled for February 11th, 2025, at 12:30 PM Eastern Time. We apologize for any inconvenience.

Thomas Abraham
GraceSoft Sales Team
713-981-5300 x 100

```

I am including here the invitation that was sent to the client which has all the information about their meeting such as date, time, invitation link etc, and I need you to retrieve that information and create a confirmation email which should address the person by name and then tell them that we're just confirming them about their meeting with us given date at the time that you can retrive from the invitation I'll include. Make sure in the confirmation email, you include the date and time of the meeting and let them know that it's just a confirmation email and that they can use the meeting link to join the meeting at the meeting time. Always tell them what type of meeting it is, the usual types are Easy InnKeeping Demo and Customer Success. You'll be able to tell which type of meeting by reading the invitation information I am including. You'll be able to retrive the meeting link from the invitation I'll include here. Here's the invitation information that was originally sent to the customer:

GraceSoft Customer Success

Thomas Abraham

Okay, I understand.  You've provided templates for Customer Success meeting confirmation, reminder, and missed meeting emails.  I will use these templates when you provide me with the invitation details.  I'll extract the necessary information (name, property, date, time, meeting link) and populate the appropriate template.  Just let me know when you're ready.

Below is template for easy InnKeeping demo for different emails, 2. Demo EmailshtmlCopy

Perfect. I now have both the Customer Success and Easy InnKeeping Demo email templates. I'm ready when you are to create emails using this information. Just provide the meeting invitation details, and I'll generate the appropriate email.
